name: Heroes of Card: Robot Attack
description:
Make your robot with friends, use your abilities and reach the enemy nexus!

This is a reverse tower defense game with multiplayer cooperation. Assault the enemy base with your robots, controlled by all the players. It's a low poly, toolbox experience with friends.

 

Goal of the game: get here before the tower. The game can have from 2 to 4 players.

Choose a card that gives abilities to your robot.

As soon as the cards are selected, the robot will be ready and hit the road. The task of the players is to activate the abilities added to the robot at the right time.

  • 2 - 4 Players
  • 4 Robot part cards
  • 4 cards with abilities
  • 4 Levels
  • Obstacles in the form of turrets, stomper and huge balls
  • Low poly world

Game Design: Mark Kadzharov Pierre Mallet

Programming: Nicolas Rogé Camille Lavarde

Art: Lylian Louat
